paper.title: Automatic Generation of a Complex Dialogue History

author.org: German National Research Center for Information Technology (GMD-IPSI) Darmstadt

paper.venue: AI '96 Proceedings of the 11th Biennial Conference of the Canadian Society for Computational Studies of Intelligence on Advances in Artificial Intelligence
paper.abstract: We briefly review our dialogue model and present a first approach to automatic analysis of interactive information retrieval dialogues based on this model. We discuss the assumptions that we have to place on the model, present an algorithm that given a certain action from either participant calculates the set of relevant partial structures that could represent this action, and discuss some criteria for selecting one of these structures.
